programme.title: Toxic Desire: Addiction
programme.desc: A psychiatrist with a painful past, haunted by his wife's suicide after rape, enters a deadly relationship.

programme.title: Summer Snow
programme.desc: To protect your loved ones, these three words are enough: 'I'm sorry, I love you, thank you.'

programme.title: Stalker
programme.desc: A woman suffers from a bizarre experience in a low-rent house and learns the terrible things about the house.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie (G.I. Joe's Byung-Hun Lee)
programme.desc: South Korean National Security Service normally deals with North Korea, but now NSS must deal with IRIS terrorists with a nuke.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: An adopted pastor reunites with his shaman brother and together, they search for their mother with dementia.

programme.title: Two Faces of My Girlfriend
programme.desc: Gu-chang falls in love with a charming girl, but her violent alter ego reveals she has multiple personalities.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: An old man’s death puts his housekeeper on trial. Soon-ho’s only witness is Ji-woo, a teen with Asperger's.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin's sister vanishes, leading to a string of mysterious deaths in their neighborhood related to her.

programme.title: Will You Be There
programme.desc: Soo-hyun saves a life of a little girl and receives ten mysterious pills from the girl’s grandfather.And the movie jumps thirty years back to when Soo-hyun was still a medical student and shows Soo-hyun and his then girlfriend Yeon-a who were very much in love with each other. With the pill's help, Soo-hyun travels back in time and meet his younger self. The movie illustrates in a moving way what it means to love and live with a choice one makes for love.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: Rival precinct chiefs race to catch a serial rapist in 2 weeks and win the 'Officer of the Year' title.

programme.title: Venus Talk
programme.desc: A story about three women who still seek hot passion at work, love, and sex.

programme.title: Beastie Boys
programme.desc: Seung-woo and Jae-hyun, serve as "hosts" or male entertainers for a discreet private women's club in Seoul.
